price: ߥߟߴߊ߬ ߡߊ߫ ߟߊߞߍ߫ ߝߋ߲߫ ߞߊ߬ߟߊߡߊ߬ ߓߊ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߦߋ߫ ߡߎߛߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߟߍߙߊ ߟߎ߬ ߞߣߐ߫؟
arabic: أَمۡ لَمۡ يُنَبَّأۡ بِمَا فِي صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: am lam yunabba bimā fī ṣuḥufi mūsā
